skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Has a 30% chance of placing a 25% [Weaken] debuff for 2 turns.
skills.name: Festering Caress

skills.desc: Attacks all enemies 3 times. Each hit has a 75% chance of placing a 30% [Decrease SPD] debuff for 2 turns. Each hit also has a 75% chance of decreasing the enemy’s Turn Meter by 10%.
skills.name: Mire of Misery
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Damage +10%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%

skills.desc:
Attacks all enemies. Has a 75% chance of placing a [Block Active Skills] debuff for 2 turns.

Also decreases the cooldowns of all ally skills, except this Champion's, by 1 turn.
skills.name: Time Dilation
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 3 Damage +10%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +15%

skills.desc:
Removes one random debuff from Astralon and this Champion at the start of each turn.

Only available if Astralon is on the team.
skills.name: Unredeemed [P]

skills.desc: Fills this Champion’s Turn Meter by 5% each time an ally receives a debuff.
skills.name: Channel Woe [P]
